entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student in the class, looking at Dean.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as a student on the other side of the classroom, looking unhappy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who says something to Harry and mentions Ginny and Dean.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned by Hermione as not speaking with Dean.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as warning Harry about Flitwick.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is mentioned as the Charms master who is approaching them.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions Ginny and Dean not speaking.
